articles.title: Camping
articles.contents:
Attendees seeking for the full experience will join us to camp in the gardens. We have reserved a section of the garden for wedding guests to camp, which has 4 preexisting deluxe tents. If you have camping gear (tent, pad, quilt / blanket), please bring it. Otherwise, let us know when RSVPing, and we’ll place you in one of the deluxe tents (which includes cots and blankets). We will also be setting up extra tents from our surplus gear.
Each deluxe tent has six cots. Therefore, ideally we can find parties of 4-6 to sleep in them. If your party size is 4-6 or you have other individuals you’d like to stay with, let us know. Families might be a good fit.
For guests that aren’t staying on the premises, we will try to suggest some local hotels, but we will not be heavily involved in this area of the planning.
Camping map at https://greatriveroutfitters.com/images/files/Camping_Rules_Regulations.pdf

articles.title: Trang & Daniel
articles.contents:
Trang & Daniel
      
      
      Home
      RSVP
      Schedule
      Venue
      Camping
      Travel
      Things to Do
      FAQ
      ☰
      
      
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Trang & Daniel
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                        RSVP
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            
            Hello and welcome!
            ⅀(x, y) = "$x ♥️ $y"
            We are celebrating our marriage July 23–25, 2021 at an encampment along the Connecticut River in Windsor, Vermont. The venue is the Path of Life Garden, which is a fusion of stunning sculpture arts, event space, river trip outfiters, and campground.
            The ceremony and reception will start at 4 pm on Saturday, July 24. We hope you can join us camping and a whole weekend of fun (see Schedule and Venue).
            using .Celebration
            
            wedding = Event(
              place = "Path of Life Garden",
              dates = "July 23—25, 2021"
            )
            invite.(family ∪ friends, (wedding,))
            rsvp && @show love |> gratitude
            
            ⅀("trang", "daniel")
            Huge thanks to our dear friend, Silvia Canelón, for creating this beautiful website.
            
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Trang & Daniel
            
            
              
                
                                    
                    
                      RSVP
                    
                  
                                  
              
            
            
              
              Hello and welcome!

              We are celebrating our marriage July 23–25, 2021 at an encampment along the Connecticut River in Windsor, Vermont. The venue is the Path of Life Garden, which is a fusion of stunning sculpture arts, event space, river trip outfiters, and campground.
              The ceremony and reception will start at 4 pm on Saturday, July 24. We hope you can join us camping and a whole weekend of fun (see Schedule and Venue).
              using .Celebration
              
              wedding = Event(
                place = "Path of Life Garden",
                dates = "July 23—25, 2021"
              )
              invite.(family ∪ friends, (wedding,))
              rsvp && @show love |> gratitude
              
              ⅀("trang", "daniel")
              Huge thanks to our dear friend, Silvia Canelón, for creating this beautiful website.

articles.title: RSVP
articles.contents:
Path of Life Garden, 36 Park Rd, Windsor, VT 05089
Map
We appreciate your early response! Please send additional comments/questions to our event coordinator Linh Phan violinhino@gmail.com.

articles.title: Schedule
articles.contents:

Friday, July 23rd
Kayaking trip

13:00 - 16.00
Floating/kayaking down the Connecticut river!
Potluck dinner

18:30 - 20.00
Anything made or purchased with love is appreciated!
Socializing

20:30 - 23.00
Beer. Bonfire. Bliss.
Saturday, July 24th

08:00 - 11:00
Make your own bagel. And coffee.

09:00 - 10:00
An alignment-based practice that transcends boundaries.
Unstructured joy

Water activities, yard games, sculpture garden
Unconventional ceremony

Yup.

20:00 -

MYOB

08:00 - 11:00
See Saturday.

~5 km double-loop around the garden.Potential uneven footing. Watch your step!

Best of each gender group receives special trophy.

articles.title: Venue
articles.contents:
Path of Life Sculpture Garden
Address: 36 Park Road Windsor, Vermont 05089. Map
Phone: (802) 674-9933
Additional links

Additional photos
Looking north from the beach.Solar bag setup for shower.We have reserved four “deluxe tents” with cots and sleeping bags for at least 6 persons/tent. This is a good option if you do not have a tent.Test run. The path will be more groomed on the day of the race.One of the sculpture works.
